column4: Hello i have a problem on ubuntu maverik, the microfone keep active.. if i touch the micro i can hear noise but i am not using it with any program so i dont understand why he keep actived
mute it with the mixer
i done but i still active
it still active i want say
apps like skype have a 'let me control the mixer' if skype is running, then that over rides the mixer.
i close skype but still have same problem
you shut skype, you muted it in the mixer, and the mike is still on?
yes! if i touch the micro i hear noise
open your mixer, and make sure you can see all devices.
there might be a second mike input
no device now
open a term and run alsamixer
you should see all audio devices attached to the machine
done and now?
or mikes ?
lets try the shotgun approach, MUTE EVERYTHING and start unmuting them one at a time
i mute everything and now the mic is silent if i touch
cool. now unmute ONE AT A TIME
then you'll know which is the real mike.
yes is the last one, the f-mic
there you go.
tanks
np
